items.title: Grilled vegetable terrine with tomato sauce

Ingredients

(makes about 3 servings)

  • 4 large onions, thinly sliced
  • a handful of cheddar curd, or grated cheddar
  • 2 tbsp mango or orange juice (optional)
  • spring onions, chopped fine
  • 6 cups chicken or vegetable stock
  • 6 leaves kale, thick ribs trimmed and torn or sliced into slivers
  • 6 tablespoons crème fraiche
  • 4 pieces stale, crusty French bread
  • 1.2kg potatoes, peeled and cut into quarters
  • 1 tsp lemon juice

Method

Sed laoreet justo nec orci lobortis imperdiet. Aliquam lacinia scelerisque libero at mattis. Curabitur ac magna erat. Integer eleifend, lacus quis cursus euismod, massa sem blandit nulla, ut dignissim turpis libero et urna.
